titles.title: A resolution to authorize representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in the case of Jones v. Salt River Pima-Maricopa Indian Community, et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 7/26/2005--Passed Senate without amendment. Authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senators John McCain, Jon Kyl, and other unnamed Senators in the case of Jones v. Salt River Pima-Maricopa Indian Community, et al.
